issue.title: [CF 823] Buff/Debuff Stacks Sorting
issue.body:
Hi, i was trying to create an icon for the council HC fight (ToT 3rd boss) that tell me which is the next player to pass the debuff on.
For this reason it should be the Buff/Debuff Stacks Sorting option. In this way we could use a Debuff Icon with stacks sorting desc that monitor raid1-10


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77 | Imported from CurseForge issue #823 | Raw

comments.body:
Added in r824.
